## useLoading() function

全局共享loading方法

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useLoading(): LoadingInjection;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[LoadingInjection](./vue.loadinginjection.md)


## Example


```ts
import { useLoading } from '@mo-yu/vue'

const { addLoading } = useLoading()

const remove = addLoading()
fetchSomething().then(()=>{
 remove()
}).catch(()=>{
 remove()
})
```
